title: Implement backend data model and persistence
description: Create backend persistence for categories and expenses, including schema/migrations, seed categories, repository methods, and validation/integrity rules described in the spec.
acceptance_criteria: Data models for Category and Expense match docs/SPEC.md entity and validation requirements.
Persistence layer supports create/read/update/delete for categories and expenses.
Default categories are seeded on first run.
Deleting a category referenced by expenses is blocked with a deterministic conflict error.
